p: The energy supply in the first 10 days was 12,4 ± 6,6 Kcal/Kg/day (0Ð34,1); Carbohydrates are the main source of calories - 1,5 ± 0,93 g/kg/day (0Ð4,2), lipids - 0,4 ± 0,3 g/kg/day (0Ð1.37), protein/amino acid administration were - 0,32 ± 0,27 g/kg/day (0Ð1.11). Regarding additional supplements besides artificial nutrition, the impact on overall energetic intake of propofol was 1 ± 0.6 Kcal /Kg/day (0-9.7), while the amount for glucose solution was 1.3 ± 1 Kcal /Kg/day (0Ð8).
